name: PogoPogo
description:
"A concert is like a small world" - Someone.

In this game, you're at a concert and you have to motivate the crowd!

Jump into the people to make them do the pogo dance! The more people are jumping, the higher your score will be.

Controls:

WASD - Running

Space - Jumping

LShift - Crowdsurfing

If your stamina runs low, pick up a beer and get some fresh energy! Just like in the real world.

This game has been made for the LudumDare38.

Credits:

Programming, Graphics, SFX, Music - @Obvious_San
